mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students( student_uuid, name, furigana_name, nickname, email, address, age, gender, remark, is_deleted ) VALUES( #{studentUuid}, #{name}, #{furiganaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{address}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, #{deleted} )
INSERT INTO student_courses( uuid, student_uuid, course_name, start_date, end_date ) VALUES( #{uuid}, #{studentUuid}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, furigana_name = #{furiganaName}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{deleted} WHERE student_uuid = #{studentUuid}
